mapper.select: select * from FACILITIES order by FAC_NO asc;
select FAC_OPEN_DATE from FACILITIES_DATE where FAC_NO = #{facNo};
select MIN(START_TIME) from FACILITIES_TIME where FAC_NO = #{facNo};
select MAX(END_TIME) from FACILITIES_TIME where FAC_NO = #{facNo};
select FAC_NO, FAC_PHOTO from FACILITIES where FAC_NO = #{facNo};
mapper.insert: insert into FACILITIES (FAC_NAME, FAC_MAX, FAC_STATE, FAC_PHOTO, FAC_ADDR, FAC_FLOOR, FAC_ADDR_NO) values( #{facName}, #{facMax}, #{facState}, #{facPhoto}, #{facAddr}, #{facFloor}, #{facAddrNo} )
mapper.select: select FAC_NO, FAC_NAME, FAC_MAX, FAC_STATE, FAC_PHOTO, FAC_OPEN_DATE, START_TIME from v_fac_date_time where FAC_NO = #{facNo};
